title: Grimm's Fairy Tales
description: Grimms' Fairy Tales By The Brothers GrimmStories include:Rapunzel, read by Katherine KellgrenCinderella, read by January LaVoyLittle Red-Cap, read by Simon VanceLittle Briar-Rose, read by Grover GardnerLittle Snow-White, read by Kate RuddRumplestiltskin, read by Jim DaleThe Shoes That Were Danced to Pieces, read by Alfred MolinaThe Twelve Brothers, read by Graeme MalcolmThe White Snake, read by Scott Brick The Elves, read by Bahni Turbin The Six Swans, read by Davina PorterThe Twelve Huntsmen, read by Dion GrahamThe Goose-Girl, read by Edoardo BalleriniSweet Porridge, read by Jayne Entwistle A Riddlng Tale, read by Janis IanThe Golden Goose, read by Bronson PinchotEve's Various Children, read by Roy DotriceSnow-White and Rose-Red, read by Julia WhelanThe Frog-King, or Iron Henry, read by Kirby HeyborneThe Sea-Hare, read by Mark BramhallHansel and Gretel, read by Robin Miles
author: Jacob Grimm
